description:
The Level of instruction will be B2.2, according to the
CERF. This module aims to broaden the students’
understanding and knowledge of the society, culture
and history of the Spanish-speaking countries. Along
with the proposed textbook, authentic source materials
will be used to convey an updated and comprehensive
view of current issues in the Hispanic world, and to
provide students with the tools necessary to
comprehend the relationship between language and
culture. This module is designed from a communicative
approach, prioritising the active use of the language and
encouraging interaction in Spanish at an
intermediate/advanced level.
title: Spanish 8
prerequisite: Level B2.2 according to the CEFR (students will have to take a placement test) or LAS4203 Spanish 7. Student must not have read a higher level module than this module.
